thought: I need to implement the parameters for the aiCompletion action to generate a joke within 30 words, and for the Gmail action to send an email with the joke content.
plan: Set aiCompletion prompt to generate a joke within 30 words.
Set Gmail sendTo to the target email address.
Set Gmail message to use the joke text from aiCompletion output.
criticism: The main challenge is correctly mapping the AI output text to the email message content and ensuring the AI prompt is clear and concise.
